courses.title: Introduction to AI
courses.description: A comprehensive course on the basics of AI, covering its history, fundamental concepts, and real-world applications.
courses.details: Offered by HarvardX, this course covers the foundations of AI, including game-playing engines, handwriting recognition, and machine translation. It provides hands-on experience with Python libraries for machine learning.

courses.title: Machine Learning for Business Leaders
courses.description: An in-depth course designed for business leaders, focusing on how to leverage machine learning to drive business value.
courses.details: This course on edX is tailored for business professionals, providing insights into leveraging machine learning for business applications.

courses.title: AI for Everyone: Master the Basics
courses.description: Understand what AI is, its applications, and its impact on our lives. No technical background needed.
courses.details: Offered by IBM on edX, this introductory course covers AI concepts, applications, and ethical considerations. It's designed for a broad audience, including those without a technical background.

courses.title: Generative AI for Everyone
courses.description: Explore the capabilities of generative AI and its applications in text, image, and code generation.
courses.details: This course by IBM on edX introduces generative AI, its capabilities, and applications across different domains.

courses.title: AI in Finance
courses.description: A tutorial on how AI is transforming the finance industry, including case studies and implementation strategies.
courses.details: This course on Coursera explores how AI is being applied in the finance industry, including practical case studies.

courses.title: Natural Language Processing
courses.description: Learn the basics of NLP and how to apply it to business problems through this hands-on tutorial.
courses.details: A comprehensive tutorial on Coursera covering NLP techniques and their business applications.

courses.title: Certified AI Practitioner
courses.description: Gain recognition as a certified AI practitioner with this comprehensive certification program.
courses.details: A professional certification on Coursera that validates skills in AI practices and principles.

courses.title: Machine Learning Certification
courses.description: Validate your machine learning expertise with this industry-recognized certification.
courses.details: An industry-recognized certification on Coursera for machine learning expertise.
